DOC.brief_summary: This trial compares the use of 6 fractions versus the standard 5 fractions of radiotherapy used in the treatment of head and neck cancer.
DOC.brief_title: Trial of Five Versus Six Fractions Per Week for Head and Neck Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose of this trial is to study the clinical effects of increasing the weekly fraction number for locally advanced head and neck cancers by a multi-institutional prospective randomised trial. The primary endpoint is to clarify whether a six fraction per week protocol has a greater effect on the survival, as compared to the conventional five fraction per week protocol.
DOC.criteria: Head and Neck Cancer Unable to give an informed consent
